name: OwnershipControlSituation
label: ownership control situation
definition: situation in which some party owns and controls something

name: isOwnedAndControlledBy
label: is owned and controlled by
definition: relates something to the party that owns, influences, manages and directs it

name: ownsAndControls
label: owns and controls
definition: directs and exercises authoritative or dominating influence over some thing that is also owned
